timeline.bodyText: This looks like the same implementation from InstancedConfiguration, but maybe we can extract this into a function in FormatUtils or CommonUtils so we don't have the code in both places?
timeline.author: ZacBlanco

timeline.bodyText: Can we add a case for a,,b to make sure empty strings are omitted?
timeline.author: ZacBlanco

timeline.bodyText: Not sure if you updated all this by hand or automatically formatted, but I think the old version of this is easier to read
timeline.author: ZacBlanco

replies.bodyText: It was auto-formatted. I reverted back.
replies.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: why delete this? do we not need it for GLUE?
timeline.author: yuzhu

replies.bodyText: Yeah, this was unused. We passed in the type in a different way.
replies.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: does this option affect deletion? should we have a comment about that?
timeline.author: yuzhu

replies.bodyText: For now, it is only related to getting tables from udb via udb sync.
